participant_1.background:
I like to sing in the rain, it helps me relax and clear my head.
I cherish my Switch, as it brings me hours of entertainment on the weekends.
i enjoy ice cream.
i spend most of my days working at my church s food pantry.
I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up.

participant_2.background:
I'm not a big fan of social media, but I'll make an effort to use it to build my reputation at work.
I'm more concerned with my health and the health of my children.
I want a home that is safe and comfortable for my family.
I'm not very tall, but I make up for it with my sweet treats.
i like to place blame on other people even when i know it is my fault.

content.text: It's going alright! How are you today?
I'm doing well! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy spending time with my family and I love to cook.
That's really nice! I like to spend time with my family as well. I also like to play my Switch.
I don't really play video games, but I do enjoy watching movies and TV shows.
Oh, that's cool! What are some of your favorite movies?
I like all sorts of movies, but I especially love comedies and action movies.
Me too! I love to laugh and I also love to be entertained.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! It's nice to meet someone who enjoys the same things as me.
Yeah, it is! I hope we can get to know each other better.
I would love that! We can start by exchanging phone numbers and social media.
